memberdef.name: msg_error
memberdef.initializer: do \ { \ MHO_Message::GetInstance().Lock(); \ MHO_Message::GetInstance().SendMessage(eError, xKEY) << xCONTENT; \ MHO_Message::GetInstance().Unlock(); \ } \ while(0)
